name: Project.99_1711
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 2 games.

[OVERHEAT] by Jooeun Hwang

This is a music clicker which will make you overheated.

[Tick Tac Tock] by Jaewon Yoo

Real-time based tic tac toe. Make five before your rival make it.
